name: 0e211513-53e3-439a-a944-a15dc3ca005d
description:
This API definition describes an application with two main functionalities:

1. Item Search:

Users can search for items using a query string.
The API accepts a q parameter in the query string for the search term.
An optional limit parameter can be used to specify the maximum number of results to return.
The response will be a JSON array containing item objects.
Each item object will have an id and a name property.
